page.title: 18The Broch Centre,Fraserburgh
page.content: The{Broch Centre}is the name given to{Fraserburgh Community Centre}which is beside the Academy with access from {Alexandra Terrace. The Centre{opened in the mid '60s and serves the people of the town and its surrounding area. The Centre provides indoor sports and exercise {facilities,}recreation and craft facilities and rooms for use by{clubs and{community groups}such as OAP's, playgroups, and disabled clubs. Also available are{secretarial {services}and{duplicating facilities for community groups,{catering facilities, and hire of{AVA, {entertainment equipment and outdoor {activity gear.}The Centre also has a {minibus}and the community can also use the Academy's minibus.(Small charges are made for some hires and facilities.
